body_html:
Unfortunately, CUPTI is a runtime dependency for certain modules in TF, so it may be best to pull in the extra 100MBs. We try to provide the non-devel images to be as a quickstart to TF, so it is better to make sure they have as little issues as possible.
But once cupti has its own package it looks like this will be much better, thanks for the information @flx42

body:
Unfortunately, CUPTI is a runtime dependency for certain modules in TF, so it may be best to pull in the extra 100MBs. We try to provide the non-devel images to be as a quickstart to TF, so it is better to make sure they have as little issues as possible.
But once cupti has its own package it looks like this will be much better, thanks for the information @flx42
